title: Plans afoot to ensure coal stock at pithead power units
description: The coal ministry in India plans to increase the closing stock of coal at thermal power plants and mines by the end of March. This comes after stocks at domestic coal-based plants decreased rapidly in the first half of October. However, the trend has now reversed, with daily coal supply exceeding consumption and a trend of stock accumulation. Production has also increased after a rainy spell in early October. As of October 21, total coal stock was 71.35 million tonnes, compared to 60.44 million tonnes last year.
